title.value: Эффект структурных изменений в динамике производства сельскохозяйственного предприятия
Effect of structural changes in the dynamics of production of agricultural enterprise
Effect of structural changes in the dynamics of production of agricultural enterprise

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Kovel', P.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: We have examined the content and meaning of the structure of cause-and-effect factors of production efficiency. We have suggested a method of estimation of resource structures through their generalization in the process of use in production in the form of branch structure of enterprise expenses. The effect of structural changes is determined taking into account coefficients of growth of money profit and production force of enterprise, indicators of balance and serious character of structural changes. Wide application of the method and analysis of obtained information are shown on the example of concrete agricultural enterprise
